p: Addition of NC particles is known to considerably alter the cement rheology as reported earlier by many authors [ 34, 35]. Alteration of rheological characteristics for all cement slurries considered in this study was evaluated to address the effect of the NC particles on the cement rheology. The 10-s and 10-min gel strengths (GS), yield point (YP), and plastic viscosity (PV) were evaluated for all of the cement slurries under study.
